job.name: TpcPrompt
job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv STARFPE NO # setenv NODEBUG yes # setup 64b starver TFG19d # staver .DEV2 foreach evtsFile(`cat $FILELIST`) set file2 = `basename ${evtsFile} .event.root`; set file = `basename ${file2} .daq`; echo "${file}" set logFile = ${file}B.log # set f=`find . -maxdepth 1 -type f -name "*${file}*.root"` # if ("${f}" == "") then root.exe -x -q -b 'TpcPrompt.C(1000000,"'${evtsFile}'","'${file}'.root")' >& ${logFile} # endif end
